name: py-inference-schema

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This package is intended to provide a uniform schema for common machine
learning applications, as well as a set of decorators that can be used
to aid in web based ML prediction applications.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependencies.name: py-pytz
dependencies.description: World timezone definitions, modern and historical.

dependencies.name: py-wrapt
dependencies.description: Module for decorators, wrappers and monkey patching.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
